Posts.Content: Mar 20, 2015 10:07PM BC2015 wrote: I had lumpectomy and 4 nodes removed a month ago. I am still in pain. It is hard to sleep regardless of position. 800 mg Advil has helped some and stretching the arm on surgery side (I developed cording) has helped a little. Make sure you ask what exercises you can do and diagrams showing how. I have burning in the Breast and my shoulder is still numb. It should get better with time. Inflammation and swelling is part on the issue I think .
